select.if: select * from md_product where categoryMainCode = #{category} order by idx desc;
select * from md_product where categoryMainCode = #{category} and categorySubCode = #{part};

mapper.select: select *, (select count(*) from md_categorySub as s where m.categoryMainCode = s.categoryMainCode) as cnt from md_categoryMain as m where categoryMainCode = #{category};
select * from md_cart where mid = #{mid} and productIdx = #{productIdx} and optionIdx = #{opIdx};
mapper.update: update md_cart set optionNum = optionNum + #{opNum}, totalPrice = #{totPrice} where idx = #{idx};

delete.if: delete from md_cart where idx IN #{item}
